data.actual_result: Ban and kick buttons are missing
data.expected_result: Menu has a ban and kick options
data.short_description: Ban/Kick buttons are missing on offline people with no roles (servers with more than 100 members)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have kick and/or ban permissions on a server - Find a person with no roles, who is currently offline in chat - Tap and hold on their avatar
